title: TikTok Scraper Input
description: Input configuration for scraping TikTok hashtags, trends, music, or user metadata.

type.title: Scrape Type
type.description: Select what to scrape: hashtag, user, trend, or music.

query.title: Query
query.description: Enter the hashtag, username, or music ID depending on the type selected.

number.title: Number of posts
number.description: Number of posts to scrape. Set 0 to scrape all posts.

download.title: Download videos
download.description: Set to true to download videos. We recommend false if you only need metadata.

filetype.title: Output file type
filetype.description: Format for the output file: json, csv, or all.

sessionFile.title: Session file path
sessionFile.description: Path to the session file containing TikTok session cookies.

proxy.title: Proxy type
proxy.description: Use Apify Residential Proxy to avoid blocks. Leave empty to use default Apify proxy.
